name: Shoot A Bunch
description:
Shoot a bunch is a simple top down tower defence game with the element of luck. You can gather starpoints, get better towers and defeat the enemy. 

How to play:

1) You buy towers using starpoints.

2) When you begin the game you "throw the dice" in order to see for how many rounds you are allowed to fire at your oponent. Every round lasts 10 seconds.

3) By attacking the oponents towers you can gather starpoints in order to buy better towers for the next game.
